meanings.definition: A device in a jet engine that injects fuel into the exhaust stream to increase thrust.
meanings.sent1: The afterburner in the jet engine helps the plane go faster.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic checked the afterburner to ensure it was functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: When the afterburner sneezed, the plane suddenly accelerated!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an afterburner, propelling her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The afterburner roared to life, pushing the aircraft forward with incredible force.
